# PeekEnumerator&lt;T&gt;.Next property

Gets the element in the collection at the next position of the enumerator.

```csharp
public T Next { get; }
```

## Return Value

The element in the collection at the next position of the enumerator.

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| InvalidOperationException | The enumerator is positioned at or after the last element.  |
